scripts.start:client: cd src/notify-app-client && npm install && npm start
scripts.build:client: cd src/notify-app-client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:server: cd src/notify-app-server && npm install && npm start
scripts.build:server: cd src/notify-app-server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:price-watcher-service: cd src/price-watcher-service && npm install && npm start
scripts.build:price-watcher-service: cd src/price-watcher-service && npm install && npm run build
